channel.title: [PI] Dupe HELP
channel.description:
Okay so this is how you do the dupe: 1. Go to any monster 2: click save account 3; Attack teh monster than back off 4: drop items you want to dupe 5: X-log 6: logging with different account 7: pick up the items you drop 8: relog with other accoutn you still have the other items in inv.
So bassicly the source saves the account to the point before he/she dropped the items.. which allows them to dupe.. How could i fix that.

item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

Add a working shutDownHook, remove the save command.

Wallah.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Dupe HELP
item.dc:creator: @santa_skillz santa skillz
item.description:
@santa_skillz wrote:

Okay so this is how you do the dupe:

  1. Go to any monster
    2: click save account
    3; Attack teh monster than back off
    4: drop items you want to dupe
    5: X-log
    6: logging with different account
    7: pick up the items you drop
    8: relog with other accoutn you still have the other items in inv.

So bassicly the source saves the account to the point before he/she dropped the items… which allows them to dupe… How could i fix that.

Read full topic
